evaluations.source: IVOTY (World Van of the Year) Committee
evaluations.opinion: PV5 received unanimous praise for its performance, efficient electric platform, userâ€‘centric design, and overall innovation, establishing a new benchmark for electric commercial vehicles.
PV5â€™s win continues Kiaâ€™s streak of four consecutive global EV awards (EV6 GT 2023, EV9 2024, EV3 2025, PV5 2026).

confirmed_facts: PV5 was awarded the 2026 World Van of the Year at the Solutranse trade show in Lyon, France.
It is the first Korean brand and first Asian electric commercial vehicle to receive this award.
The award decision was unanimous among 26 judges.
PV5 outperformed finalists such as Ford Eâ€‘Transit Courier, Ford Eâ€‘Transit, Volkswagen Crafter, and ParaiZen SV.
The evaluation considered technology innovation, efficiency, safety, environmental impact, and sustainability.
Kia has won four consecutive global EV awards (EV6 GT 2023, EV9 2024, EV3 2025, PV5 2026).

timeline.event: PV5 announced as 2026 World Van of the Year during Solutranse in Lyon, France.
Kia released official press statement confirming the award.
Kia EV6 GT named 2023 World Car of the Year.
Kia EV9 named 2024 World Car and World Electric Car.
